title: Simple Personal Questions
description: Improve your Japanese speaking skills with simple personal questions. Focus on clear pronunciation and appropriate intonation.
instructions: Below is a list of simple personal questions in Japanese.
Aim for clear and natural pronunciation.
Maintain a conversational and steady pace.
After recording, listen to your playback and compare it to the text.
Pay attention to intonation, clarity, and fluency in Japanese.
Repeat the recording process as necessary to improve your Japanese speaking skills.

items.question: お名前は何ですか？ (Onamae wa nan desu ka?)
items.answer: お名前は何ですか？ (Onamae wa nan desu ka?)
